title: Dynamics plugin common definitions
description: Common definitions for Dynamics plugin schemas

point.description: Point used for dynamics computation (e.g. spacecraft)
point.default: If not provide here, the point is associated in the Trajectory to the propagated point

axes.description: Axes used for dynamics computation (e.g. ICRF)
axes.default: If not provided here, the axes are associated in the Trajectory to ICRF

inputAxes.description: Optional name of the axes in the frame system in which the input acceleration is given

mass.description: Spacecraft mass (optionally parameterized) for acceleration computation

file.description: IPF acceleration file path (3 acceleration components in Cartesian coordinates in km/s^2)

interpOrder.description: Optional interpolation order for the IPF acceleration file

blockEvents.description: Optional flag to include IPF acceleration file blocks as dynamic events or not

calibration.default: Constant 1.0 calibration for all three components

calibrationAxes.description: Optional name of the axes in the frame system in which the acceleration can be calibrated

scaleWithMainComponent.description: Optional flag to scale all components with the main component, assumed to be the X axis

occulters.description: List of bodies in the universe to be considered as occulters of the SRP

eclipseEvents.description: Flag to whether generate events at the eclipse enter/exit
